1. Functions for prior, likelihood and posterior 

```{r}
prior <- function (x) {
  sigma = 100;
  return (1/(sigma^2*2*pi)*exp(-(x^2)/(sigma^2)))
}

likelihood <- function (y, beta0, beta1, x) {
  p = 1/(1+exp (-beta0 - beta1*x))
  return (p^y*(1-p)^(1-y))
}

posterior <- function (y, beta0, beta1, x) {
  return (prior(x)*likelihood(y, beta0, beta1, x))
}
```
